What are the treatments for megalencephaly-capillary malformation syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of megalencephaly-capillary malformation syndrome:  - Contact a Family  - Gene Review: Gene Review: PIK3CA-Related Segmental Overgrowth  - Genetic Testing Registry:
